content: कथं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [किम्-प्रकारार्थेथमु कादेशश्च] {@--1@} How, in what way, in what manner, whence; कथं मारात्मके त्वयि विश्वासः <ls>H. 1</ls>; अथ स वैद्यः कथं <ls>Mu. 2</ls> ‘well how did the physician fare’; सानुबंधाः कथं न स्युः संपदो मे निरापदः <ls>R. 1. 64</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 44</ls>; कथमात्मानं निवेदयामि कथं वात्मापहारं करोमि <ls>Ś. 1</ls> (where the speaker is doubtful as to the propriety of what he says). {@--2@} Oh what! indeed! (expressing surprise); कथं मामेवोद्दिशति <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--3@} It is often connected with the particles इव, नाम, नु, वा, or स्विद् in the sense of, ‘how indeed,’ ‘how possibly’, ‘I should like to know’, (where the question is generalized); कथं वा गम्यते <ls>U. 3</ls>; कथं नामैतत् <ls>U. 6.</ls> {@--4@} When connected with the particles चित्, चन or अपि it means ‘in every way’, ‘on any account’, ‘somehow’, ‘with great difficulty’, ‘with great efforts’; तस्य स्थित्वा कथमपि पुरः <ls>Me. 3</ls>; कथमप्युन्नमितं न चुंबितं तु <ls>Ś. 3. 25</ls>; न लोकवृत्तं वर्तेत वृत्तिहेतोः कथंचन <ls>Ms. 4. 11</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 143</ls>; कथंचिदीशा मनसां बभूवुः <ls>Ku. 3. 34</ls>; कथं कथमपि उत्थितः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; विसृज्य कथमप्युमां <ls>Ku. 6. 3</ls>; <ls>Me. 22</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 12</ls>, <ls n="Amaru.">39</ls>, <ls n="Amaru.">50</ls>, <ls n="Amaru.">73</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Scarcely, hardly; कथमपि भुवनेऽस्मिंस्तादृशा संभवंति <ls>Māl. 2. 9.</ls>
